title: West Coast Cabernet Sauvignon Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, January 28, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a bold and expressive tasting showcasing standout West Coast Cabernet Sauvignons, featuring acclaimed producers from Napa Valley, Sonoma, and Washington State.

Tasting Fee: $40 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Ink Grade Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 – 94 pts James Suckling, 93 pts Wine Enthusiast, 92 pts Wine Spectator – A vivid, tightly focused Napa Cabernet with currant, ripe plum, pine needle, sage, and polished tannins driven by biodynamically farmed fruit.

• Bledsoe Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 94 pts Wine Spectator, 93 pts Jeb Dunnuck – Deep yet refined with blackberry, cherry, herbs de Provence, flint, and broad-shouldered structure balanced by supple tannins.

• Justin Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 92 pts James Suckling – Plush and layered with forest fruit, mulberry, cocoa, graphite, cigar humidor, and velvety texture built for both enjoyment now and cellaring.

• Details by Sinegal Cabernet Sauvignon – 93 pts James Suckling – A plush, value-driven Cabernet with dark berries, currants, scorched earth, lead pencil, and chocolate, delivering Napa-level depth from Sonoma fruit.

Explore the power, balance, and regional character of West Coast Cabernet—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
